Structs/ManagedObjectsChange.html#/s:10I.name: objects
Structs/ManagedObjectsChange.html#/s:10I.abstract: The managed objects which have been changed.

Structs/ManagedObjectChange.html#/s:10IN.name: object
Structs/ManagedObjectChange.html#/s:10IN.abstract: The managed object which has been changed.

Structs/ManagedNotification.html#/s:10IN.name: objectChanged
Structs/ManagedNotification.html#/s:10IN.abstract: A notification that posts when the managed object has changed, e.g. in a different context.

Structs/ManagedNotification.html#/s:10IN.name: contextSaved
Structs/ManagedNotification.html#/s:10IN.abstract: A notification that posts when the context completes a save.

Structs/CoreDataPreview.html.name: CoreDataPreview
Structs/CoreDataPreview.html.abstract: A view which wraps any view which is depending ona CoreDataManager instance

Structs/ManagedNotification.html.name: ManagedNotification
Structs/ManagedNotification.html.abstract: The notification emitted by a managed object.

Structs/ManagedObjectChange.html.name: ManagedObjectChange
Structs/ManagedObjectChange.html.abstract: The published event when a managed object might change.

Structs/ManagedObjectsChange.html.name: ManagedObjectsChange
Structs/ManagedObjectsChange.html.abstract: The published event when multiple managed objects might change.

Protocols/ManagedObjectWrappingModel.htm.name: managedObject
Protocols/ManagedObjectWrappingModel.htm.abstract: The reference property pointing to the wrapped managed object.

Protocols/ManagedObjectWrappingModel.htm.name: init(managedObject:)
Protocols/ManagedObjectWrappingModel.htm.abstract: An initializer which takes the matching managed object and assigns it to the reference property.
Returns true if the objectID of the wrapped managed objects

Protocols/ManagedObjectWrappingModel.htm.name: inContext(_:)
Protocols/ManagedObjectWrappingModel.htm.abstract: Returns a new model with the wrapped managed object retrieved from the given context.

Protocols/ManagedObjectWrappingModel.htm.name: addToContext()
Protocols/ManagedObjectWrappingModel.htm.abstract: Inserts the model’s wrapped managed object into its persist store on save.

Protocols/ManagedObjectWrappingModel.htm.name: removeFromContext()
Protocols/ManagedObjectWrappingModel.htm.abstract: Deletes the model’s wrapped manager object from its persistent store on save.

Protocols/ManagedObjectWrappingModel.htm.name: removeIndex(fromModels:indexKeyPath:indexSetter:)
Protocols/ManagedObjectWrappingModel.htm.abstract: Removes a model’s index by decrementing the index of all following models.

Protocols/ManagedObjectWrappingModel.htm.name: insertIndex(index:intoModels:indexKeyPath:indexSetter:)
Protocols/ManagedObjectWrappingModel.htm.abstract: Inserts a new model’s index into the list of models.

Protocols/ManagedObjectModelWrapping.htm.name: asModel
Protocols/ManagedObjectModelWrapping.htm.abstract: Returns a corresponding model which wraps this managed object.

Protocols/ManagedObjectModelWrapping.htm.name: ManagedObjectModelWrapping
Protocols/ManagedObjectModelWrapping.htm.abstract: Extend a managed object to conform to this protocol to get an automatic wrapping model for it.

Protocols/ManagedObjectWrappingModel.htm.name: ManagedObjectWrappingModel
Protocols/ManagedObjectWrappingModel.htm.abstract: A protocol to mark Models so that they can be used by a managed object

Extensions/NSManagedObject.html#/s:So15N.name: inContext(_:)
Extensions/NSManagedObject.html#/s:So15N.abstract: Get an object from a desired context using the objectID which

Enums/ManagedObjectChangeType.html#/s:10.name: inserted
Enums/ManagedObjectChangeType.html#/s:10.abstract: An object has been added to a context.

Enums/ManagedObjectChangeType.html#/s:10.name: deleted
Enums/ManagedObjectChangeType.html#/s:10.abstract: An object has been deleted from a context.

Enums/CoreDataManagerError.html#/s:10INC.name: multipleLoadStoreCalls
Enums/CoreDataManagerError.html#/s:10INC.abstract: An invalid state of the manager caused by multiple calls of loadStore().

Enums/CoreDataManagerError.html#/s:10INC.name: modelNotFound
Enums/CoreDataManagerError.html#/s:10INC.abstract: The model’s “momd” resource couldn’t be found in the bundle.

Enums/CoreDataManagerError.html#/s:10INC.name: initializeCloudKitSchemaFailed(_:)
Enums/CoreDataManagerError.html#/s:10INC.abstract: Creating the CloudKit schema failed during set up of the persistent store.

Enums/CoreDataManagerError.html.name: CoreDataManagerError
Enums/CoreDataManagerError.html.abstract: Programmer errors which can be thrown while creating a CoreDataManager or PersistentContainer.

Classes/PersistentContainer.html#/c:@M@I.name: defaultDirectoryURL()
Classes/PersistentContainer.html#/c:@M@I.abstract: Returns the location of the directory that contains the persistent stores.

Classes/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCore.name: defaultDataModelName
Classes/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCore.abstract: The default name of a data model in the bundle, equals to “DataModel”.

Classes/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCore.name: defaultStoreDirectoryName
Classes/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCore.abstract: The default folder name of the persistent store in the documents folder, equals to “CoreData”.

Classes/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCore.name: mainContext
Classes/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCore.abstract: A reference to the viewContext for tasks on the main context.

Classes/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCore.name: createNewContext()
Classes/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCore.abstract: Creates a new managed object context for background tasks.

Classes/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCore.name: persist()
Classes/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCore.abstract: Saves any changes of the main context.

Classes/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCore.name: performTask(_:)
Classes/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCore.abstract: Executes a task block on a new background context and persists any changes.

Classes/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCore.name: publisher(managedObject:notificationType:changeTypes:)
Classes/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCore.abstract: Returns a publisher which emits events for changes on a managed object.

Classes/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCore.name: publisher(managedObjectType:context:notificationType:changeTypes:)
Classes/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCore.abstract: Returns a publisher which emits events for changes on any object

Classes/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCore.name: publisher(managedObjectType:context:changeTypes:)
Classes/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCore.abstract: Returns a publisher which emits events for changes on any object

Classes/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCore.name: publisher(context:changeTypes:)
Classes/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCore.abstract: Returns a publisher which emits events for changes on a context when saved.

Classes/CoreDataManager.html.name: CoreDataManager
Classes/CoreDataManager.html.abstract: A manager for CoreData which acts as a facade for the PersistentContainer.

Classes/PersistentContainer.html.name: PersistentContainer
Classes/PersistentContainer.html.abstract: The underlying persistent container which derives from NSPersistentCloudKitContainer to support iCloud sharing.
